name: Double-O Cubed
description:
Created for the February 2017 unofficial Unreal Engine Game Jam in 48 hours. Theme was Undercover & Wait! ... It's Not What You Think.

Controls/Notes: WASD to move around; left click to select (shoot in bonus mode)

Gameplay: Move the character around and find out which one you are actually moving. Click to extract the agent. Bonus level activated after 5 agents saved. (Bonus level activated on failure after 5 or more agents)
